summary: The End Racial and Religious Profiling Act of 2025 (ERRPA) aims to eliminate racial, religious, and other discriminatory profiling by law enforcement agencies. The bill prohibits racial profiling, mandates data collection on investigatory activities disaggregated by race, ethnicity, and religion, and requires the Attorney General to issue regulations and reports. It provides for civil actions to enforce the prohibition and authorizes grants to eliminate racial profiling.  The bill also sets guidelines for administrative complaint procedures and independent audit programs.
